Column.name: Template
Template
Template
Column.value:
$COMMENT="Convert SQL type to JAVA type" $COMMENT="Convert the SQL type of Postgres to the corresponding JAVA type"
$varType = $parameter1
%if $varType == ""% $ParamType = "int" %elseIf $varType == "bigint"% $ParamType = "long" %elseIf $varType == "varchar"% $ParamType = "String" %elseIf $varType == "decimal"% $ParamType = "double" %elseIf $varType == "double precisition"% $ParamType = "double" %elseIf $varType == "integer"% $ParamType = "int" %else% $ParamType = $varType %endIf% $ParamType

Column.name: Template
Column.value:
%if attName == "uuid" or attName == "history"% %endTemplate%
$propertyName=%attName% $propertyName=%REMOVE_PREFIX($propertyName,genOptPropertyPrefix)% $propertyName=%CONVERT_NAME($propertyName, "pascal case", "camel case")% $propertyName=%CONVERT_NAME($propertyName, "HT()HT", "Ht()ht")%
$sourceName=%CONVERT_NAME(className, "Ht()ht", "ht()ht")% + "_" + %attName% %if attAlias != ""% $sourceName=%attAlias% %endIf% $targetName=%genOptJavaSetPrefix% + $propertyName
$type=%ConvertSqlType(attType)% %if $type == "String"% $program = "target." + $targetName + " ( source.getValue( \"" + $sourceName + "\", \"\" ) );" %elseIf $type == "int"% $program = "target." + $targetName + " ( source.getValue( \"" + $sourceName + "\", Integer.valueOf(0) ).intValue() );" %elseIf $type == "long"% $program = "target." + $targetName + " ( source.getValue( \"" + $sourceName + "\", Long.valueOf(0) ).longValue() );" %elseIf $type == "float"% $program = "target." + $targetName + " ( source.getValue( \"" + $sourceName + "\", Float.valueOf(0) ).floatValue() );" %elseIf $type == "double"% $program = "target." + $targetName + " ( source.getValue( \"" + $sourceName + "\", Double.valueOf(0) ).doubleValue() );" %endIf%
$program
